input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Taylor Stitch"
Reference Product Name: "The Organic Cotton Shop Tee"
Reference Product Description:
The heavyweight champ of our tailored tee shirt lineup, The Organic Cotton Shop Tee is crafted from a burly organic cotton jersey with a subtle ribbed finish for increased stretch and comfort. Built to stand up to the most demanding of days, this one stays on hand all year long and gets better with every wear.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Faherty Men's Long-Sleeve Sunwashed Regenerative Cotton T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Legend&Trade; Surf Stripe Sweater Hoodie'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Sunwashed Regenerative Cotton V-Neck Short-Sleeve T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Short Sleeve Movement Polo'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Short-Sleeve Palma Linen Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Sunwashed Regenerative Cotton T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Brand Long Sleeve Luxe Heathered Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Women's Sunwashed Essential Tee'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Sunwashed Crewneck Sweater'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Breeze Floral Print Short-Sleeve Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Women's Sunwashed Regenerative Cotton Knit Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Sunwashed Cotton T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Crewneck Sweatshirt'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Movement Monterey Plaid Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Sunwashed Pocket Tee'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Relaxed Fit Cabana Towel Terry Shirt'
  - Name='Bombas Women's Pima Cotton V-Neck T-Shirt 3-Pack'
  - Name='Bombas Pima cotton SS Crew-neck T-shirt'
  - Name='Everlane The Organic Cotton Crew Short Sleeve T-Shirt'
  - Name='Everlane Essential Organic Crew T-shirt'
  - Name='Marine Layer Men's Tailored Crew T-Shirt'
  - Name='Marine Layer Men's Saddle Hem Crew T-Shirt'
  - Name='Seaforestation Logo T-Shirt'
  - Name='Outerknown Blanket Shirt with Little Boxes'
  - Name='Patagonia Men's Long-Sleeved Work Henley Pocket Tee'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Long-Sleeve Sunwashed Regenerative Cotton T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Both are cotton T-shirts designed for comfort and durability, though the reference is heavyweight short-sleeve while this is long-sleeve and potentially lighter weight, decreasing direct similarity.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Legend&Trade; Surf Stripe Sweater Hoodie
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a sweater hoodie, different silhouette, heavier layering piece, and not a T-shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Sunwashed Regenerative Cotton V-Neck Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A short-sleeve cotton T-shirt like the reference, similar function, but v-neck versus crewneck and likely lighter weight jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Short Sleeve Movement Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve shirt but a polo style, different collar, more formal and structured than a crew T-shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Short-Sleeve Palma Linen Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve shirt but made of linen and likely a button-up; different fabric and style from heavyweight cotton T-shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Sunwashed Regenerative Cotton T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cotton T-shirt, likely lighter weight, but similar function and casual use as the reference tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Brand Long Sleeve Luxe Heathered Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve polo shirt differs significantly in silhouette and fabric from the heavyweight organic cotton tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Women's Sunwashed Essential Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: T-shirt style and cotton material align well; difference is gendered cut and possibly lighter fabric weight.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Sunwashed Crewneck Sweater
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sweater differs in construction and intended layering use from cotton T-shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Breeze Floral Print Short-Sleeve Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve shirt but likely woven, patterned, and button-up, making it less similar to a heavyweight tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Women's Sunwashed Regenerative Cotton Knit Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cotton knit shirt shares fabric family and casual style, but probably lighter and different cut.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Sunwashed Cotton T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar cotton T-shirt offering but presumably lighter weight and less tailored than the reference tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Crewneck Sweatshirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sweatshirt heavier and designed as outer garment; differs from T-shirt construction and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Movement Monterey Plaid Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Plaid shirt likely a woven button-up style, distinct from a knit T-shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Sunwashed Pocket Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cotton T-shirt with a casual pocket detail, quite similar in function though probably lighter weight.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Relaxed Fit Cabana Towel Terry Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Terry cloth fabric and relaxed fit shirt likely intended as loungewear, differing from tailored heavyweight tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bombas Women's Pima Cotton V-Neck T-Shirt 3-Pack
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar cotton T-shirt product, though pima cotton and v-neck style differ from heavyweight organic cotton crew tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bombas Pima cotton SS Crew-neck T-shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve crewneck cotton T-shirt, close in style and function though fabric differs (pima vs organic heavyweight cotton).

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane The Organic Cotton Crew Short Sleeve T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is very closeâ€”organic cotton, crew neck, short sleeve T-shirt, likely similar weight and function to the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Essential Organic Crew T-shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Organic cotton, crew neck tee similar to reference but possibly differing in fabric weight and finish.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Marine Layer Men's Tailored Crew T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Tailored crew neck cotton T-shirt similar in function and style though fabric specifics unknown.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Marine Layer Men's Saddle Hem Crew T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Crew neck T-shirt, likely cotton, but saddle hem detail creates a different silhouette from the tailored reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seaforestation Logo T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Basic logo T-shirt probably cotton and crew neck aligns moderately but no tailoring or fabric weight details.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Outerknown Blanket Shirt with Little Boxes
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely a shirt made from woven heavier fabric, not a T-shirt style, differing in silhouette and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Patagonia Men's Long-Sleeved Work Henley Pocket Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve henley cotton shirt shares casual workwear orientation but differs in neckline and sleeve length from reference tee.
